title: 5 Simple Steps to Log into Google

steps.title: Go to Google.
steps.content: Go to Google. Go to google.com or search for Google in your browser's search box.

steps.title: Click on Sign in.
steps.content: Click on Sign in . The blue Sign in button is on the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Enter your email address and click on Next.
steps.content: Enter your email address and click on Next . You can also use your phone number to sign in. If you don't have a Google account, you can learn how to create one here .

steps.title: Type your password and click on the Next.
steps.content: Type your password and click on the Next . If you forget your Google or Gmail password, click on the Forgot password? link and follow this steps .

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Now you can see your Google profile picture on the right corner. If you want to sign out from Google, click on your Google profile picture and select Sign out from there.
